content.rendered:
Building connections is essential to making families feel welcome and excited to join our school community. The goal of our Family Welcome Program is to pair a current family with a new family that has recently moved into the school district. 

New Families: If you would like to be paired with a mentor family, please complete the  Family Mentor Request Form.

Mentor Families: Mentor Families serve as a friendly point of contact for questions and a familiar face at school events. If you’re interested in serving as a mentor, please complete the Mentor Application Form. We will maintain a list of mentors, and families will only be contacted if they are paired with a family.
